title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.2 - Composition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.2 - Composition

State Regulations

The office of the ombudsman shall be composed of a director
who shall be an ombudsman and an attorney admitted to practice in the State of

New York and ombudsmen who shall also be attorneys admitted to practice in the

State of New York. They may be assisted by staff who are knowledgeable in the
areas of juvenile justice and youth rights. The ombudsmen shall have direct
access to the director of the division. The Director of Ombudsman shall report
to the director of the division. The director and the ombudsmen shall be
appointed and removed by the director of the division in accordance with
applicable Civil Service laws, rules and regulations and negotiated agreements. They shall be State employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9

177.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
